description:
For all types of meeting room chairs and conference chairs, browse our large range of meeting chairs here. We have a vast array of styles, colours and materials, to create a relaxed, comfortable yet professional meeting room or boardroom. We offer chairs with:
  • wooden frames with upholstered seat & backrests,
  • wooden frames with wooden seat & backrests,
  • metal frames with upholstered seat & backrests,
  • metal frames with polypropylene or wooden seat & backrests,
  • polypropylene chairs,
  • rattan chairs,
  • metal chairs and
  • office chairs.
All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
name: Meeting Chairs
